name: Pogo Doggo
description:
Created in less than 3 days for ScoreSpace Game Jam #21.

The game's objective it's to get the best high score you can.

To get points you need to release the bounce button at the right time, and do some stunts.

Hold Space to get impulse and release for bounce higher.

Controll the character with A / D  or left and right arrow

To fall faster to the ground press S or down button

I uploaded the Web and the .exe version, feel free to download the game if you want.
